English Sentences: Son of man, hath not the house of Israel, the rebellious house, said unto thee, What doest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, he makkalanchcha zareti, Israa7eela asati nena, Neeni oottiyoobai aibee? giidi oichchidosona gidokkonaa?

English Sentences: Say thou unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; This burden concerneth the prince in Jerusalem, and all the house of Israel that are among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ha hiraagai Yerusalaamen de7iya halaqaabaanne Israa7eela asaa kumettaabaa" yaaga yaagees.

English Sentences: Say, I am your sign: like as I have done, so shall it be done unto them: they shall remove and go into captivity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta, Taani intteyyo malaata. Taani oottidoogaadan, intte bolli hanana; intte omoodettidi, hara biitti baana yaaga.

English Sentences: And the prince that is among them shall bear upon his shoulder in the twilight, and shall go forth: they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby: he shall cover his face, that he see not the ground with his eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta giddon de7iya halaqai godaa lukki kiyidi, ba miishshaa ba hashiyan tookkidi, lem77ishin baana; i biittaa be7ennaadan, ba som77uwaa kammana.

English Sentences: My net also will I spread upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare: and I will bring him to Babylon to the land of the Chaldeans; yet shall he not see it, though he shall die there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI ta gitiyaa a sinttan yeggada, a oiqqana. Taani a Baabiloone katamaa ehaana; shin i he katamaa be7ennan haiqqana.

English Sentences: And I will scatter toward every wind all that are about him to help him, and all his bands; and I will draw out the sword after them.
Wolaitta Sentences: A yuushuwan de7iya a maaddiyaageetanne a olanchchata ubbaa taani piskki oottana; taani eta bisuwan yedettana.

English Sentences: And they shall know that I am the LORD, when I shall scatter them among the nations, and disperse them in the countries.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta taani hara biittatunne kawotettatu giddo laaliyo wode, taani GODAA gidiyoogaa eti erana.

English Sentences: But I will leave a few men of them from the sword, from the famine, and from the pestilence; that they may declare all their abominations among the heathen whither they come; and they shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta biyo kawotettatu giddon bantta tuna oosuwaa paaxana mala, taani etappe amaridaageeta olaappe, koshaappenne boshaappe kessi ekkanaadan oottana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa eti hegan erana" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came to me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, eat thy bread with quaking, and drink thy water with trembling and with carefulness;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, ne oittaa kokkoraidda ma; qassi ne haattaakka gajigajaidda uya.

English Sentences: And say unto the people of the land, Thus saith the Lord GOD of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and of the land of Israel; They shall eat their bread with carefulness, and drink their water with astonishment, that her land may be desolate from all that is therein, because of the violence of all them that dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittan de7iya asau hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI Israa7eela biittan de7iya Yerusalaame asaabaa hagaadan yaagees; "Eti bantta oittaa hirggan maana; bantta haattaakka shabbirssan uyana. Aissi giikko, yan de7iya asai ubbai makkalanchcha gidido gishshau, eta biittai qaarettidi, kallo attana.

English Sentences: And the cities that are inhabited shall be laid waste, and the land shall be desolate; and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i asai kumido katamati xayana; qassi biittaikka baisa gidana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, what is that proverb that ye have in the land of Israel, saying, The days are prolonged, and every vision faileth?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, ha Israa7eela asai, Gallassai aadhdhiis; ajjuutai ubbaikka hada gidiis yaagidi leemisiyoobai i aibee?

English Sentences: Tell them therefore, Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will make this proverb to cease, and they shall no more use it as a proverb in Israel; but say unto them, The days are at hand, and the effect of every vision.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, etayyo neeni, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ha leemisoi naa77antto hassayettennaadan oottana; eti zaarettidi, hegaa Israa7eela biittan leemisokkona" yaagees yaaga. Qassi etayyo, Gallassai matattiis; ajjuutai ubbaikka polettana hanees yaaga.

English Sentences: For there shall be no more any vain vision nor flattering divination within the house of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe sinttau Israa7eela asaa giddon worddo ajjuutainne cimo murunnoi de7enna.

English Sentences: For I am the LORD: I will speak, and the word that I shall speak shall come to pass; it shall be no more prolonged: for in your days, O rebellious house, will I say the word, and will perform it, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI ta oottanaagaa yootais; hegeekka gam77ennan polettana. Inttenoo, makkalanchcha asatoo, taani yootiyoobaa ubbaa intte laittan taani polana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: Again the word of the LORD came to me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, behold, they of the house of Israel say, The vision that he seeth is for many days to come, and he prophesieth of the times that are far off.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, Israa7eela asai hagaadan yaagees; I be7ido ajjuutai sinttanau daro laittaassa; qassi i adussa wodiyan hananaagaa yootees yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; There shall none of my words be prolonged any more, but the word which I have spoken shall be done, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni etau hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani yootiyo qaalai polettanaappe attin, issoikka gam77enna. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy, and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts, Hear ye the word of the LORD;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, Israa7eelan ha77i hananabaa yootiyaageetu bolli hananabaa yoota. Bantta qofaappe denddidi, hananabaa yootiyaageeta hagaadan yaaga; GODAA qaalaa siyite!

English Sentences: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe unto the foolish prophets, that follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Aibanne be7ennan coo banttau denddiya eeyya hananabaa yootiyaageetuyyo aayye7ana!

English Sentences: O Israel, thy prophets are like the foxes in the deserts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asau, intte hananabaa yootiyaageeti qolettida katamaa giddon de7iya worakanatu mala.

English Sentences: Ye have not gone up into the gaps, neither made up the hedge for the house of Israel to stand in the battle in the day of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gallassi olan minni eqqanaadan, Israa7eela asaassi dirssaa gimbbiyaa bottokonidi minttanau, gimbbee kolettidosaa pude bibookkona.

English Sentences: They have seen vanity and lying divination, saying, The LORD saith: and the LORD hath not sent them: and they have made others to hope that they would confirm the word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta ajjuutai worddo, qassi eta murunnoikka worddo. Eti GODAI kiittennan, GODAI hagaadan yaagees yaagoosona. Yaatidi eti yootidoogaa GODAI polana yaagidi naagoosona.

English Sentences: Have ye not seen a vain vision, and have ye not spoken a lying divination, whereas ye say, The LORD saith it; albeit I have not spoken?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yootennan de7ishin, GODAI hagaadan yaagees yaagidi yootiyo intte worddo ajjuutaanne worddo murunnuwaa be7ibeekketii?" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because ye have spoken vanity, and seen lies, therefore, behold, I am against you, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte worddobaa haasayido gishshaunne worddo ajjuutaa be7ido gishshau, taani intteyyo morkke.

English Sentences: And mine hand shall be upon the prophets that see vanity, and that divine lies: they shall not be in the assembly of my people, neither shall they be written in the writing of the house of Israel, neither shall they enter into the land of Israel; and ye shall know that I am the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kushee worddo ajjuutaa be7idi, worddo hananabaa yootiyaageetu bolli pirddau de7ees. Eti ta asaa yaa7an gelokkona, woikko Israa7eela asai xaafettido mazggafan xaafettokkona, woikko eti Israa7eela biittaakka gelokkona. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana.

English Sentences: Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, Peace; and there was no peace; and one built up a wall, and, lo, others daubed it with untempered morter:
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Saroi bainnan de7ishin, eti ta asaa, Sa7i saro! yaagidi wora kaalettidosona. Qassi asai shuchchaa coo keelidi dirin, eti nooraa tiyoosona.

English Sentences: Say unto them which daub it with untempered morter, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing shower; and ye, O great hailstones, shall fall; and a stormy wind shall rend it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he tiyiyaageeta, He intte tiyido gimbbee kunddana! Wolqqaama irai bukkana; qassi taani GODAI ordde shachchaa duge yeggana; hanttaara goteekka denddana yaagidi yootite.

English Sentences: Lo, when the wall is fallen, shall it not be said unto you, Where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it?
Wolaitta Sentences: He gimbbee kunddido wode, asai inttena, intte a tiyido noorai anee? giidi oichchennan agganee?" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I will even rend it with a stormy wind in my fury; and there shall be an overflowing shower in mine anger, and great hailstones in my fury to consume it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ta hanqquwan hanttaara gotiyaa yeddana; qassi biittaa bashshanau ta yiilluwan ordde shachchaanne wolqqaama iraa suulliya hanqquwaara kiittana.

English Sentences: So will I break down the wall that ye have daubed with untempered morter, and bring it down to the ground, so that the foundation thereof shall be discovered, and it shall fall, and ye shall be consumed in the midst thereof: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte nooraa tiyido gimbbiyaa taani mentterettana, biittan laalananne baasuwaa mela ashshana. I kunddiyo wode intte a giddon haiqqana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana.

English Sentences: Thus will I accomplish my wrath upon the wall, and upon them that have daubed it with untempered morter, and will say unto you, The wall is no more, neither they that daubed it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan hanidi, ta hanqqoi gimbbiyaa bollinne gimbbiyaa nooraa tiyida asatu bolli wurana. Taani inttena, Ha77i gimbbee baawa; gimbbiyaa nooraa tiyidaageetikka de7okkona.

English Sentences: To wit, the prophets of Israel which prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and which see visions of peace for her, and there is no peace, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelan de7iya, Yerusalaamebaa hananabaa yootidaageeti, saroi bainnan ayyo saruwaa be7idaageeti, eti de7okkona yaagais. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: Likewise, thou son of man, set thy face against the daughters of thy people, which prophesy out of their own heart; and prophesy thou against them,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, bantta qofaappe denddidi, hananabaa yootiya ne asaa maccaasatukko ha77i ne som77uwaa zaara; zaarada eta bolli hananabaa yoota.

English Sentences: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe to the women that sew pillows to all armholes, and make kerchiefs upon the head of every stature to hunt souls! Will ye hunt the souls of my people, and will ye save the souls alive that come unto you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Hara asaa bollan asayyo wolqqai de7anaadan, eta kushiyan ubban murunnobaa sikkidi wottiyaanne qanttanne adussa asaassi shaashiyaa giigissiya maccaasatoo, intteyyo aayye7ana! Intte ta asaa woranaunne pattanau intteyyo maatai de7anaadan koyeeta.

English Sentences: And will ye pollute me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread, to slay the souls that should not die, and to save the souls alive that should not live, by your lying to my people that hear your lies?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi kophphe bangga woikko issi baso oitta demmanau, yeellayiyaabaa oottidi, ta asaa sinttan tana kaushsheeta. Hegaa giyoogee intte haiqqanau bessennaageeta woridi, attanau bessennaageeta ashsheeta giyoogaa. Yaatidi ta asaassi wordduwaa odeeta; etikka intte wordduwaa siyoosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: Wherefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against your pillows, wherewith ye there hunt the souls to make them fly, and I will tear them from your arms, and will let the souls go, even the souls that ye hunt to make them fly.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte hara asaa bollan asaayyo wolqqai de7anaadan, intte kushiyan wottido murunnuwaa taani ixxais. Taani a intte kushiyaappe duutta olana; piriyaappe kessi ekkiya kafuwaadan, taani eta intte wolqqaappe ashsha ekkana.

English Sentences: Your kerchiefs also will I tear, and deliver my people out of your hand, and they shall be no more in your hand to be hunted; and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte shaashiyaakka qaara ekkada, ta asaa merinau intte kushiyaappe wotta ekkana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana.

English Sentences: Because with lies ye have made the heart of the righteous sad, whom I have not made sad; and strengthened the hands of the wicked, that he should not return from his wicked way, by promising him life:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani azzanissabeenna xillo asaa wozanaa intte wordduwan azzanissideta; nagaranchchatikka bantta iita oosuwaappe simmidi, bantta shemppuwaa ashshennaadan, intte eta minttideta.

English Sentences: Therefore ye shall see no more vanity, nor divine divinations: for I will deliver my people out of your hand: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, naa77antto worddo ajjuutaa be7ekketa; murunnobaakka oottekketa. Taani ta asaa intte kushiyaappe wotta ekkana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: Then came certain of the elders of Israel unto me, and sat before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela cimatuppe amaridaageeti taakko yiidi, ta sinttan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, these men have set up their idols in their heart, and put the stumblingblock of their iniquity before their face: should I be enquired of at all by them?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, ha asati bantta wozanan eeqaa essidosona; qassi eta nagarai etayyo xubbiya shuchchaa mala gidiis. Yaatin, taani eti tana oichchanaadan oottooyye?

English Sentences: Therefore speak unto them, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Every man of the house of Israel that setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to the prophet; I the LORD will answer him that cometh according to the multitude of his idols;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni etayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eela asaappe ooninne eeqaa ba wozanan wottikko, a nagarai ayyo xubbiya shuchcha mala gidikko, qassi hananabaa yootiyaagaakko i biikko, taani GODAI ta huuphen a eeqatu coratettaadan ayyo zaarana.

English Sentences: That I may take the house of Israel in their own heart, because they are all estranged from me through their idols.
Wolaitta Sentences: He eeqati ubbati Israa7eela asaa taappe wora zaaridosona; shin ha77i taani etayyo immiyo zaaruwan eta wozanaa taakko zaarana" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Repent, and turn yourselves from your idols; and turn away your faces from all your abominations.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela asaassi hagaadan yaagada oda; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Nagaraa paaxite! Intte eeqaappe simmite! Intte tuna ooso ubbaappekka simmite!

English Sentences: For every one of the house of Israel, or of the stranger that sojourneth in Israel, which separateth himself from me, and setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to a prophet to enquire of him concerning me; I the LORD will answer him by myself:
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Israa7eela asa gidin, woikko Israa7eela biittan de7iya allaga asaa gidinkka, taappe shaahettidi, ba wozanan eeqaa wottikko, a nagarai ayyo xubbiya shuchchaa mala gidikko, qassi i ta zoriyaa oichchanau hananabaa yootiyaagaakko biikko, taani GODAI ta huuphen ayyo zaaruwaa immana.

English Sentences: And I will set my face against that man, and will make him a sign and a proverb, and I will cut him off from the midst of my people; and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he uraara eqettana; taani a leemisonne malaata oottana; taani a ta asaa giddoppe xaissana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana.

English Sentences: And if the prophet be deceived when he hath spoken a thing, I the LORD have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand upon him, and will destroy him from the midst of my people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Hananabaa yootiyaagee cimettidi, hananabaa yootikko, he hananabaa yootiyaagaa cimmidaagee tana GODAA. Taani a bolli ta kushiyaa yeddada, ta asaa giddoppe a xaissana.

English Sentences: And they shall bear the punishment of their iniquity: the punishment of the prophet shall be even as the punishment of him that seeketh unto him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti naa77aikka bantta nagaraa nagaraa qixaatiyaa tookkana; hananabaa yootiyaagaa qixaateekka hananabaa oichchiyaagaa qixaateekka issi mala gidana.

English Sentences: That the house of Israel may go no more astray from me, neither be polluted any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela asati taappe wora bookkona; bantta nagaran ubban banttana tunissokkona. Eti ta asa gidana; taanikka eta Xoossaa gidana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: The word of the LORD came again to me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, when the land sinneth against me by trespassing grievously, then will I stretch out mine hand upon it, and will break the staff of the bread thereof, and will send famine upon it, and will cut off man and beast from it:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, issi biittaa asai nagaraa oottidi, taayyo ammanettennan ixxikko, taani ta kushiyaa yeddada, etau qumaa xaissada, koshaa ehaana; he biittaa asaanne mehiyaa worana.

English Sentences: Though these three men, Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, they should deliver but their own souls by their righteousness, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai atto ha heezzu asati, Nohee, Daaneelinne Iyyoobi he biittan de7iyaakkokka, eti bantta xillotettan bantta shemppo xalaalaa ashshana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: If I cause noisome beasts to pass through the land, and they spoil it, so that it be desolate, that no man may pass through because of the beasts:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Woi taani eta biittaa bollan bazzo do7ata yeddin, he do7ati an de7iya asaa xaissin, he do7atu gaasuwan ooninne giddoora kanttennaadan, he biittai baisa gidikko,

English Sentences: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters; they only shall be delivered, but the land shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Harai atto, ha heezzu asati he biittan de7iyaakkokka, eti bantta attumanne bantta macca naata ashshanau danddayokkona. Eta xalaalai attana; shin biittai baisa gidana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Or if I bring a sword upon that land, and say, Sword, go through the land; so that I cut off man and beast from it:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Woikko taani he biittaa bollan bisuwaa ehaada, Ha biittaara bisoi kantto gaada, an de7iya asaanne mehiyaa worikko,

English Sentences: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters, but they only shall be delivered themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Ha heezzu asati he biittan de7iyaakkokka, bantta attumanne bantta macca naata ashshanau danddayokkona. Eta xalaalai attana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Or if I send a pestilence into that land, and pour out my fury upon it in blood, to cut off from it man and beast:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Woikko taani he biittaa bollan boshaa yeddada, ta hanqquwaa a bollan gussikko, an de7iya asaanne mehiyaa worikko,

English Sentences: Though Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither son nor daughter; they shall but deliver their own souls by their righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Harai atto, Nohee, Daaneelinne Iyyoobi he biittan de7iyaakkokka, eti bantta xillotettan bantta shemppuwaa ashshanaappe attin, bantta attumanne bantta macca naatakka ashshokkona. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: For thus saith the Lord GOD; How much more when I send my four sore judgments upon Jerusalem, the sword, and the famine, and the noisome beast, and the pestilence, to cut off from it man and beast?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani asaanne mehiyaa woranau Yerusalaame bolli ta oiddu hanttaara pirddata, bisuwaa, koshaa, bazzo do7aanne boshaa yeddiyo wode, i ai keena aaro iitabaa gidanddeeshsha!

English Sentences: Yet, behold, therein shall be left a remnant that shall be brought forth, both sons and daughters: behold, they shall come forth unto you, and ye shall see their way and their doings: and ye shall be comforted concerning the evil that I have brought upon Jerusalem, even concerning all that I have brought upon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin amarida asati paxa attana; eti bantta attumanne bantta macca naatakka ashshana. Eti inttekko yiyo wode, eta hanotaanne eta oosuwaa intte be7idi, taani Yerusalaame bolli ehiido bashshai ubbai bessiyaagaa gidiyoogaa akeekana.

English Sentences: And they shall comfort you, when ye see their ways and their doings: and ye shall know that I have not done without cause all that I have done in it, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte eta hanotaanne eta oosuwaa be7idi, taani eta bolli coo pirddabeennaagaa erana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, woiniyaa turai bazzon de7iya hara mittaappe aibin kehii?

English Sentences: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?
Wolaitta Sentences: Go77i de7iyo mitti turaappe qanxxetti erii? Aibakko kaqqiyo koca appe kessa erai?

English Sentences: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?
Wolaitta Sentences: A oisettodan taman yeggin, ya baggainne ha baggai taman meetettin, gidduwan attida xiixinttai ai maaddanee?

English Sentences: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xuugettennan de7iiddi, kase aikko maaddibeennaagee, tamai min eexxiichchidi aikko maaddenna.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Taani bazzo mittaa giddon de7iya woiniyaa turaa tamau oiseto oottada immidoogaadan, Yerusalaamen de7iya asaakka hegaadan oottana.

English Sentences: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the LORD, when I set my face against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta som77uwaa eta bollan zaarana. Eti issi tamaappe kiyikkokka, hara tamai eta maana. Taani ta som77uwaa eta bolli zaariyo wode, taani GODAA gidiyoogaa eti erana.

English Sentences: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tanan ammanettennan aggido gishshau, taani eta biittaa baisa kessana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais yaagees" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: Again the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, Yerusalaamo i tuna oosota erissa.

English Sentences: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD unto Jerusalem; Thy birth and thy nativity is of the land of Canaan; thy father was an Amorite, and thy mother an Hittite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI Yerusalaamo hagaadan yaagees; "Ne zareenne ne yeletai Kanaane biittaana; ne aawai Amoore biittaa asa; ne aayyiyaakka Hiite biittaa asa.

English Sentences: And as for thy nativity, in the day thou wast born thy navel was not cut, neither wast thou washed in water to supple thee; thou wast not salted at all, nor swaddled at all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne yelettiyo gallassi ne gul77ai qanxxettibeenna; woikko nena geeshshanau haattan meecettabaakka; woikko maxiniyan gorppettada carqqiyan xaaxettabaakka.

English Sentences: None eye pitied thee, to do any of these unto thee, to have compassion upon thee; but thou wast cast out in the open field, to the lothing of thy person, in the day that thou wast born.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha geetettidabatuppe issuwaanne oottanau neeyyo azzanidabi baawa. Neeni yelettido gallassi karettido gishshau, dembban olettadasappe attin, neeyyo ooninne qarettibeenna.

English Sentences: And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live; yea, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Hegaara taani kanttaidda, neeni ne suuttaa giddon murqquuqada zohettishin be7aas; be7ada neeni ne suuttaa giddon zin77idosan de7ishin, "Paxa de7a" yaagaas.

English Sentences: I have caused thee to multiply as the bud of the field, and thou hast increased and waxen great, and thou art come to excellent ornaments: thy breasts are fashioned, and thine hair is grown, whereas thou wast naked and bare.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena shooqan de7iya kattaadan dichchaas. Neeni dicca aduqqada, gamma gakkadasa. Ne xanttai uttiis; ne binnaanaikka dicciis; shin neeni kallo attadasa.

English Sentences: Now when I passed by thee, and looked upon thee, behold, thy time was the time of love; and I spread my skirt over thee, and covered thy nakedness: yea, I sware unto thee, and entered into a covenant with thee, saith the Lord GOD, and thou becamest mine.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Naa77anttuwaa taani hegaara kanttaidda, nena xeelliyo wode, neeni gelossi gakkada borssida asa gidadasa. Yaatin, ta maayuwaa ne bolli yeggada, ne kalluwaa kammaas. Taani neeyyo caaqqada nenaara maachchaa maacettin, neeni taaro gidadasa. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Then washed I thee with water; yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee, and I anointed thee with oil.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani ne bollai suuttan moorettidaagaa haattan meecca geeshshada, zaitiyan tiyaas.

English Sentences: I clothed thee also with broidered work, and shod thee with badgers' skin, and I girded thee about with fine linen, and I covered thee with silk.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena alleeqo qamisiyaa maizzaas; qassi lo77o galbbaappe oosettida caammaakka wotissaas; qassi liinuwaa shaashiyaakka nena qacissaas; qassi al77o kutaakka qumaashshaas.

English Sentences: I decked thee also with ornaments, and I put bracelets upon thy hands, and a chain on thy neck.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena ta alleequwan alleeqaas; ne kushiyan sagaayuwaa wottaas; ne qooriyankka gujjumaa wottaas.

English Sentences: And I put a jewel on thy forehead, and earrings in thine ears, and a beautiful crown upon thine head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ne siiriyan gutichchaa, ne haittankka gutichchaa, ne huuphiyankka lo77o kallachchaa wottaas.

English Sentences: Thus wast thou decked with gold and silver; and thy raiment was of fine linen, and silk, and broidered work; thou didst eat fine flour, and honey, and oil: and thou wast exceeding beautiful, and thou didst prosper into a kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni worqqaaninne biran alleeqettadasa; ne maayoi ubbai payya liinuwaa, al77o kutaanne alleeqo qamise. Ne miyo qumai muruta xiilliyaa, eessaanne zaitiyaa. Neeni keehi puulanchcha gidada, kawiyo kiyanau denddadasa.

English Sentences: And thy renown went forth among the heathen for thy beauty: for it was perfect through my comeliness, which I had put upon thee, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni puulanchcha gidiyo gishshau, kawotettatun erettadasa. Aissi giikko, taani neeyyo immido bonchchoi nena hagaa oottiis. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: But thou didst trust in thine own beauty, and playedst the harlot because of thy renown, and pouredst out thy fornications on every one that passed by; his it was.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin neeni ne puulan ammanettadasa; haratun erettidoogaappe denddidaagan shaaramuxa gidadasa; ogiyaara kanttiya ubbaara shaaramuxadasa.

English Sentences: And of thy garments thou didst take, and deckedst thy high places with divers colours, and playedst the harlot thereupon: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne maayuwaappe amaridaagaa ekkada, ne goinniyo sohota alleeqissadasa; yaatada yan shaaramuxadasa. Hegaa mala hanotai hagaappe kase hanibeenna; hagaappe sinttanaukka hananau bessenna.

English Sentences: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given thee, and madest to thyself images of men, and didst commit whoredom with them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo immido worqqaappenne biraappe oosettida lo77o alleequwaa, attuma misileta oottada medhdhadasa; yaatada etaara shaaramuxadasa.

English Sentences: And tookest thy broidered garments, and coveredst them: and thou hast set mine oil and mine incense before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani immido alleeqo maayuwaa he misileta maizzadasa. Qassi ta zaitiyaanne ta ixaanaa etau shiishshadasa.

English Sentences: My meat also which I gave thee, fine flour, and oil, and honey, wherewith I fed thee, thou hast even set it before them for a sweet savour: and thus it was, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani neeyyo immido qumaa, muruta xiilliyaa, zaitiyaanne eessaa eta sinttan sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho oottada shiishshadasa. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Moreover thou hast taken thy sons and thy daughters, whom thou hast borne unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured. Is this of thy whoredoms a small matter,
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Qassikka, neeni taayyo yelido attuma naatanne macca naata efaada, eeqatuyyo yarshshadasa. Neeni shaaramuxa kiyidoogee neeyyo guuxxidee?

English Sentences: That thou hast slain my children, and delivered them to cause them to pass through the fire for them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta naata shukkada, eeqaassi taman yarshshadasa.

English Sentences: And in all thine abominations and thy whoredoms thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, when thou wast naked and bare, and wast polluted in thy blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tunatettaaninne ne shaaramuxan ubban de7aidda, kase ne yelagatettaa laittaa, kallo ne suuttan murqquuqada, zohettido wodiyaa dogadasa.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after all thy wickedness, (woe, woe unto thee! saith the LORD GOD;)
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Aayye7ana! Neeyyo aayye7ana! Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais. Ha ne iitatetta ubbaa bolli qassi,

English Sentences: That thou hast also built unto thee an eminent place, and hast made thee an high place in every street.
Wolaitta Sentences: dabaaba ubban eeqau goinniyo sohota neeyyo giigissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast built thy high place at every head of the way, and hast made thy beauty to be abhorred, and hast opened thy feet to every one that passed by, and multiplied thy whoredoms.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oge doonan ubban shaaramuxiyo sohota keexxada, ne puulaa tunissadasa; ogiyaara kanttiya ubbau ne asatettaa aatta immada, shaaramuxettaa darissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast also committed fornication with the Egyptians thy neighbours, great of flesh; and hast increased thy whoredoms, to provoke me to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni amo xallan kumida, ne shooro Gibxxetuura shaaramuxadasa; ne shaaramuxettaa daruwankka tana hanqqetissadasa.

English Sentences: Behold, therefore I have stretched out my hand over thee, and have diminished thine ordinary food, and delivered thee unto the will of them that hate thee, the daughters of the Philistines, which are ashamed of thy lewd way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani ta kushiyaa ne bolli yeddaas; nena gakkiya ne shaahuwaakka guuttaas. Taani nena ne pokko hanotan yeellatiya, nena morkkiya Pilisxxeema maccaasatussi aattada immaas.

English Sentences: Thou hast played the whore also with the Assyrians, because thou wast unsatiable; yea, thou hast played the harlot with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni alenna asa gidiyo gishshau, Asoore biittaa asaarakka shaaramuxadasa. He ubbankka hagee tau gidana gabaakka.

English Sentences: Thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication in the land of Canaan unto Chaldea; and yet thou wast not satisfied herewith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi, zal77iyan aqida Baabiloonetuurakka shaaramuxadasa; hegankka gidana gabaakka.

English Sentences: How weak is thine heart, saith the LORD GOD, seeing thou doest all these things, the work of an imperious whorish woman;
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Neeni ha yeelli bainna shaaramuxeedan haniyaara, ne aiba laafa asee! Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: In that thou buildest thine eminent place in the head of every way, and makest thine high place in every street; and hast not been as an harlot, in that thou scornest hire;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni oge doonan shaaramuxiyo sohota neeyyo keexxiyo wodenne dabaaba ubban eeqau goinniyo sohota giigissiyo wode, hara shaaramuxatudan, shaaramuxati ekkiyo miishshaakka ekkabaakka.

English Sentences: But as a wife that committeth adultery, which taketh strangers instead of her husband!
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Bii ha shaaramuxa maccaasee, neeni ne azinaa aggada, allagatuura zin77adasa!

English Sentences: They give gifts to all whores: but thou givest thy gifts to all thy lovers, and hirest them, that they may come unto thee on every side for thy whoredom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attumaasai shaaramuxatussi miishshaa qanxxees; shin neeni ne laggettotussi miishshaa qanxxaasa; eti mulesaappe neekko yaanaadan, maganxxaa etau immaasa.

English Sentences: And the contrary is in thee from other women in thy whoredoms, whereas none followeth thee to commit whoredoms: and in that thou givest a reward, and no reward is given unto thee, therefore thou art contrary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan ne shaaramuxatettai hara maccaasatuugaappe dumma; nenaara shaaramuxanau nena kaalliyaabi issoinne baawa. Harai neeyyo qanxxennan, yaa qanxxada shaaramuxiyoogan, haratuppe neeni dumma" yaagees.

English Sentences: Wherefore, O harlot, hear the word of the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, bii ha shaaramuxee, GODAA qaalaa siya!

English Sentences: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thy filthiness was poured out, and thy nakedness discovered through thy whoredoms with thy lovers, and with all the idols of thy abominations, and by the blood of thy children, which thou didst give unto them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni ne shaaramuxatettan ne laggettotussi ne bollaa qaarido gishshau, neeyyo tuna eeqati darido gishshaunne ne naatu suuttaa neeni etayyo gussido gishshau,

English Sentences: Behold, therefore I will gather all thy lovers, with whom thou hast taken pleasure, and all them that thou hast loved, with all them that thou hast hated; I will even gather them round about against thee, and will discover thy nakedness unto them, that they may see all thy nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni etan ufaittido ne laggettota ubbaa, neeni siiqiyoogeetanne neeni ixxiyoogeeta taani shiishshana hanais. Taani eta ne bolli ubbasaara shiishshada, eta sinttan nena mulxxu oottada qaarana; qaarin eti ne kalluwaa be7ana.

English Sentences: And I will judge thee, as women that break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will give thee blood in fury and jealousy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani shaaramuxida maccaasatu bollinne suuttaa gussida maccaasatu bolli pirddiyoogaadan, ne bolli pirddana; taani ta hanqquwaaninne ta mishuwan ne bolli haiquwaa ehaana.

English Sentences: And I will also give thee into their hand, and they shall throw down thine eminent place, and shall break down thy high places: they shall strip thee also of thy clothes, and shall take thy fair jewels, and leave thee naked and bare.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena ne laggettotuyyo aatta immana; eti ne shaaramuxiyo sohotanne eeqau goinniyo sohota qoli xaissana. Eti ne maayuwaa mulxxu ootti qaaridi, ne lo77o alleequwaakka wotti ekkidi, nena kallo xiire ashshana.

English Sentences: They shall also bring up a company against thee, and they shall stone thee with stones, and thrust thee through with their swords.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti nena shuchchan caddi woriyaanne bantta bisuwan qanxxerettiya guite asaa ne bolli ehaana.

English Sentences: And they shall burn thine houses with fire, and execute judgments upon thee in the sight of many women: and I will cause thee to cease from playing the harlot, and thou also shalt give no hire any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne keettaa xuuggidi, daro maccaasaa sinttan ne bolli pirddana. Taani ne shaaramuxatettaa agissana; neenikka ne laggettotuyyo naa77antto yaa miishshaa qanxxakka.

English Sentences: So will I make my fury toward thee to rest, and my jealousy shall depart from thee, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottin, taani ne bolli hanqqettido hanqqoi wodhdhana; taani ne hanotan mishettido mishoikka hegan aadhdhana. Taani hegan woppu gaada, naa77antto hanqqettikke.

English Sentences: Because thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, but hast fretted me in all these things; behold, therefore I also will recompense thy way upon thine head, saith the Lord GOD: and thou shalt not commit this lewdness above all thine abominations.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Neeni ne yelagatettaa laittaa dogada, ha iita ooso ubban tana hanqqetissadasa. Hegaa gishshau, tumaappe ne oottidobaa ubbaa taani ne bollan zaarana. Neeni ne tuna oosotu ubbaa bolli shaaramuxatettaa aibissi gujjadii? Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Behold, every one that useth proverbs shall use this proverb against thee, saying, As is the mother, so is her daughter.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Bii Yerusalaamee, asai ne bolli, Na7iyaakka aayee mala giidi leemisuwaa yootana.

English Sentences: Thou art thy mother's daughter, that lotheth her husband and her children; and thou art the sister of thy sisters, which lothed their husbands and their children: your mother was an Hittite, and your father an Amorite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumu neeni ba azinaanne ba naata shenetida ne aayee mala; qassi bantta azinaa azinaanne bantta naata naata shenetida ne michchetu mala. Ne aayyiyaa Hiite biittaa asa; ne aawai qassi Amoore biitta asa.

English Sentences: And thine elder sister is Samaria, she and her daughters that dwell at thy left hand: and thy younger sister, that dwelleth at thy right hand, is Sodom and her daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne baira michchiyaa ba macca naatuura neeppe huuphessa baggaara de7iya Samaariyo; qassi neeppe kaalo michchiyaa ba macca naatuura neeppe tohossa baggaara de7iya Sadoomo.

English Sentences: Yet hast thou not walked after their ways, nor done after their abominations: but, as if that were a very little thing, thou wast corrupted more than they in all thy ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta ogiyaa kaallidoogeenne eta tuna oosota oottidoogee nena alibeenna. SHin neeni guutta wodiyan oottido oosoi etaagaappe iitaa darees.

English Sentences: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, Sodom thy sister hath not done, she nor her daughters, as thou hast done, thou and thy daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Neeninne ne macca naati oottidoogaadan, ne michchiyaa Sadoomanne i macca naati oottibookkona.

English Sentences: Behold, this was the iniquity of thy sister Sodom, pride, fulness of bread, and abundance of idleness was in her and in her daughters, neither did she strengthen the hand of the poor and needy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne michchiyaa Sadooma oottido nagarai hagaa: anne i macca naati otoranchcha, kallidaageetanne ishaluwan de7iyaageeta gidikkonne, eti metootanchchaanne hiyyeesaa maaddibookkona.

English Sentences: And they were haughty, and committed abomination before me: therefore I took them away as I saw good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti otoranchcha gididi, ta sinttan tuna oosota oottidosona. Hegaa gishshau, intte be7idoogaadankka, taani eta xaissaas.

English Sentences: Neither hath Samaria committed half of thy sins; but thou hast multiplied thine abominations more than they, and hast justified thy sisters in all thine abominations which thou hast done.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Samaariyaa neeni oottido nagarau baggaakka oottabeikku; neeni etaagaappe aadhdhida tuna oosota oottadasa. Yaatada he ne oottido tuna oosotu ubbaa gaasuwan, ne michcheti xillo milatanaadan oottadasa.

English Sentences: Thou also, which hast judged thy sisters, bear thine own shame for thy sins that thou hast committed more abominable than they: they are more righteous than thou: yea, be thou confounded also, and bear thy shame, in that thou hast justified thy sisters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne michcheta suure asa kessido gishshau, kaushshaa maaya. Aissi giikko, ne nagarai etaagaappe aadhdhi iitin, hegan eti neeppe xillo milatidosona. Hegaa gishshau, yeellatada, kaushshaa maaya.

English Sentences: When I shall bring again their captivity, the captivity of Sodom and her daughters, and the captivity of Samaria and her daughters, then will I bring again the captivity of thy captives in the midst of them:
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Gidikkonne, Sadoomonne i macca naata, qassi Samaariyoonne i macca naata taani zaarada ishalissiyo wode, nenakka ishalissana.

English Sentences: That thou mayest bear thine own shame, and mayest be confounded in all that thou hast done, in that thou art a comfort unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neban neeni keehi yeellatana; neeni kauyyidoogan, ne michcheti neeppe kehiyoogaa eridi minettana.

English Sentences: When thy sisters, Sodom and her daughters, shall return to their former estate, and Samaria and her daughters shall return to their former estate, then thou and thy daughters shall return to your former estate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne michcheti, Sadooma ba macca naatuura, qassi Samaariyaakka ba macca naatuura bantta kase ishaluwau simmana; neenikka ne macca naatuura intte kase ishaluwau simmana.

English Sentences: For thy sister Sodom was not mentioned by thy mouth in the day of thy pride,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne iitatettai qonccanaappe kase, ne otoruwaa wode, neeni harai atto,

English Sentences: Before thy wickedness was discovered, as at the time of thy reproach of the daughters of Syria, and all that are round about her, the daughters of the Philistines, which despise thee round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: ne michchee Sadoomi bolli qilliiccabeikkii? Gidikkonne, ha77i neeni Eedooma macca naatinne a shooro ubbai, qassi Pilisxxeema macca naatinne ne yuushuwan de7iya, nena ixxiya ubbai qiriyoobaa kiyadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast borne thy lewdness and thine abominations, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne shaaramuxatettaaninne ne tuna oosotun qaxxayettana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the Lord GOD; I will even deal with thee as thou hast done, which hast despised the oath in breaking the covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni maachchaa kanttido gishshaunne caaquwaa kolido gishshau, neeni oottido oosuwaadan, taani neeyyo oottana.

English Sentences: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth, and I will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, taani ne yelagatettaa wodiyan nenaara maacettido maachchaa qaalaa hassayana; qassi merinaa maachchaakka nenaara maacettana.

English Sentences: Then thou shalt remember thy ways, and be ashamed, when thou shalt receive thy sisters, thine elder and thy younger: and I will give them unto thee for daughters, but not by thy covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani ne bairanne ne kaalo michcheta neekko ehiyo wode, neeni ne hemetaa hassayada yeellatana. Taani eta neeyyo macca naata oottada immana; shin hegee taani nenaara maacettido maachchaadan gidenna.

English Sentences: And I will establish my covenant with thee; and thou shalt know that I am the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegau taani ta maachchaa nenaara wottana. Taani GODAA gidiyoogaa neeni hegan erana.

English Sentences: That thou mayest remember, and be confounded, and never open thy mouth any more because of thy shame, when I am pacified toward thee for all that thou hast done, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeni oottido nagaraa ubbaa atto yaagiyo wode, neeni ne oottidobaa hassayada, yeellau ne doonaa oiqqana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, put forth a riddle, and speak a parable unto the house of Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, Israa7eela asaa qan77ishiyaa qan77isha; etau leemisuwan yoota.

English Sentences: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; A great eagle with great wings, longwinged, full of feathers, which had divers colours, came unto Lebanon, and took the highest branch of the cedar:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Lo77iya baalletinne gita gita qefeti de7iyo issi argganttai de7ees. He argganttai Liibaanoosa yiis; yiidi zigaa xeeran uttiis.

English Sentences: He cropped off the top of his young twigs, and carried it into a land of traffick; he set it in a city of merchants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uttidi he zigaa licuwaa menttiis; he menttido licuwaa ekkidi, zal77ee dariyo biittaa, zal77anchchatu katamaa efiis.

English Sentences: He took also of the seed of the land, and planted it in a fruitful field; he placed it by great waters, and set it as a willow tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""I Israa7eela biittaappe puutiyaa efiidi, aradda biittan, daro haattai de7iyoosan tokkiis.

English Sentences: And it grew, and became a spreading vine of low stature, whose branches turned toward him, and the roots thereof were under him: so it became a vine, and brought forth branches, and shot forth sprigs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pude aacida turai darii aduqqennan daayiis. A daashshai argganttaakko simmidi daayiis; shin a xaphoi biitta giddo geliis. He turai maraa yeliis; haittaakka kessiis.

English Sentences: There was also another great eagle with great wings and many feathers: and, behold, this vine did bend her roots toward him, and shot forth her branches toward him, that he might water it by the furrows of her plantation.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Hegaadankka, lo77iya baalletinne gita gita qefeti de7iyo hara issi argganttai de7ees. Haattaa demmana giidi, he turai ba tokettidosaappe he argganttai de7iyoosaakko, ba xaphuwaanne ba daashshaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: It was planted in a good soil by great waters, that it might bring forth branches, and that it might bear fruit, that it might be a goodly vine.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tokettidoi aacanau, aifanaunne lo77o woine gidanau danddayiyoosan, aradda biittan, daro haattai de7iyoosaana" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: Say thou, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Shall it prosper? shall he not pull up the roots thereof, and cut off the fruit thereof, that it wither? it shall wither in all the leaves of her spring, even without great power or many people to pluck it up by the roots thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Etayyo neeni hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He turai diccanee? Koiro a tokkida argganttai a shoddennee? SHoddidi a aifeta qoqqofidi, a irxxa haittata melissennee? A he sohuwaappe xaphuwaara pude shoddanau gita wolqqaa, woikko daro asaa koshshenna.

English Sentences: Yea, behold, being planted, shall it prosper? shall it not utterly wither, when the east wind toucheth it? it shall wither in the furrows where it grew.
Wolaitta Sentences: A shoddidi, harasan tokkiyaakko, i diccanee? Arshsho bagga bazzo carkkoi shocin, ba tokettidosan muleera melennee?" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Say now to the rebellious house, Know ye not what these things mean? tell them, Behold, the king of Babylon is come to Jerusalem, and hath taken the king thereof, and the princes thereof, and led them with him to Babylon;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha makkalanchcha asaayyo hagaadan yaaga; He leemisuwaa birshshettai aibakko erekketii? Hegee aibee giikko, Baabiloone kawoi Yerusalaame yiidi, eta kawuwaanne eta halaqata omooddidi, Baabiloone efiis.

English Sentences: And hath taken of the king's seed, and made a covenant with him, and hath taken an oath of him: he hath also taken the mighty of the land:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi kawuwaa keettaa asaappekka issuwaa ekkidi, aara issippe caaqqidi maacettiis; yaatidi asaa giddon aifettiyaageeta omooddidi efiis.

English Sentences: That the kingdom might be base, that it might not lift itself up, but that by keeping of his covenant it might stand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa oottidoogee eta kawotettai wolqqaa xayidi, naa77antto denddennaadan, bantta maachchaa xalaalaa naagidi de7anaadaana.

English Sentences: But he rebelled against him in sending his ambassadors into Egypt, that they might give him horses and much people. Shall he prosper? shall he escape that doeth such things? or shall he break the covenant, and be delivered?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yihudaa kawoi makkali denddidi, paratanne daro olanchchata yeddanaadan, Gibxxe kiittiis. Ayyo hegee hananddeeshsha? Hagaa malabaa oottidaagee i bau kessi ekkanddee? Qassi maachchaa kanttidi, i bau kessi ekkanddee?

English Sentences: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, surely in the place where the king dwelleth that made him king, whose oath he despised, and whose covenant he brake, even with him in the midst of Babylon he shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Bana kawoyida kawuwaa maachchaa kanttido gishshaunne caaquwaa karido gishshau, he kawuwaa biittan, Baabiloonen i haiqqana.

English Sentences: Neither shall Pharaoh with his mighty army and great company make for him in the war, by casting up mounts, and building forts, to cut off many persons:
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone kawoi daro asaa woranau gimbbiyaa lanqqen biittaa diddiqidi giigissiyo wode, Gibxxe kawoi ba olanchchatuuranne ba daro asaara yinkka, ainne maaddenna.

English Sentences: Seeing he despised the oath by breaking the covenant, when, lo, he had given his hand, and hath done all these things, he shall not escape.
Wolaitta Sentences: I caaquwaa kariis; maachchaa kanttiis. I ba kushiyaakka immidi, ba giidoogaa polibeenna. Hegaa gishshau, au kessi ekkiyoosi baawa.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; As I live, surely mine oath that he hath despised, and my covenant that he hath broken, even it will I recompense upon his own head.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais; i karido ta caaquwaanne i kanttido ta maachchaa taani a bolli zaarada ehaana.

English Sentences: And I will spread my net upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare, and I will bring him to Babylon, and will plead with him there for his trespass that he hath trespassed against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta gitiyaa a bolli miccin, i ta piriyan ohettana. I taayyo ammanettennan ixxido gishshau, taani a Baabiloone efaada, hegan a bolli pirddana.

English Sentences: And all his fugitives with all his bands shall fall by the sword, and they that remain shall be scattered toward all winds: and ye shall know that I the LORD have spoken it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Doorettida a olanchchati bisuwan haiqqana; paxa attidaageeti bantta ginaara ginaara laalettana. Hagaa haasayidaagee tana GODAA gidiyoogaa intte erana.

English Sentences: Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will also take of the highest branch of the high cedar, and will set it; I will crop off from the top of his young twigs a tender one, and will plant it upon an high mountain and eminent:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani adussa zigaa xeeraa licuwaappe qanxxa ekkada, xoqqanne adussa deriyaa huuphiyan tokkana.

English Sentences: In the mountain of the height of Israel will I plant it: and it shall bring forth boughs, and bear fruit, and be a goodly cedar: and under it shall dwell all fowl of every wing; in the shadow of the branches thereof shall they dwell.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a Israa7eela deriyaa huuphiyan tokkana; hegan maraa yelidi, aifiyaakka aifananne lo77o ziga gidana. Kafo zaree mulee an keexxana; eti a maaraa kuwan shemppana.

English Sentences: And all the trees of the field shall know that I the LORD have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish: I the LORD have spoken and have done it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoqqa mittaa ziqqi oottiyaagee, ziqqa mittaa xoqqu oottiyaagee, irxxa mittaa melissiyaageenne mela mittaakka aacissiyaagee, tana GODAA gidiyoogaa bazzo mitta ubbai erana. Taani GODAI hagaa yootaas; taani yootidoogaa taanikka oottana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiiddi yiis.

English Sentences: The word of the LORD came unto me again, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: What mean ye, that ye use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children's teeth are set on edge?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela biittaabaa intte, Aawati caala woiniyaa teeraa min, naata achchai zil77iis giidi intte leemisiyoobai aibee?

English Sentences: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, ye shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Hagaappe sinttau intte Israa7eela biittan ha leemisuwaa leemisekketa.

English Sentences: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul that sinneth, it shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa ubbaa shemppoi taagaa; aawaa shemppoikka na7aa shemppoikka taagaa. Nagaraa oottiya shemppoi i bau haiqqana.

English Sentences: But if a man be just, and do that which is lawful and right,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi xillo gidikko, tumu pirddaanne suuretettaa oottikko,

English Sentences: And hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, neither hath defiled his neighbour's wife, neither hath come near to a menstruous woman,
Wolaitta Sentences: i deriyaa bolli de7iya eeqau goinniyo sohotun maana xayikko, i Israa7eela asaa eeqau goinnana xayikko, ba shooruwaa maccaasaa tunissana xayikko, qassi kushe qitai yiido maccaasaara zin77ana xayikko,

English Sentences: And hath not oppressed any, but hath restored to the debtor his pledge, hath spoiled none by violence, hath given his bread to the hungry, and hath covered the naked with a garment;
Wolaitta Sentences: oonanne huqqunnana xayikko, acuwaassi oiqqidobaa guyye zaarikko, issi uraanne bonqqana xayikko, bau de7iyaagaappe namisettida asa mizikko, kallottidaagaa maizzikko,

English Sentences: He that hath not given forth upon usury, neither hath taken any increase, that hath withdrawn his hand from iniquity, hath executed true judgment between man and man,
Wolaitta Sentences: i woriyaa ekkanau dichchau tal77ana xayikko, ba kushiyaa balaappe shiishshi ekkikko, asaa giddon tumaa pirddikko,

English Sentences: Hath walked in my statutes, and hath kept my judgments, to deal truly; he is just, he shall surely live, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: ta higgiyan hemettikko, ta wogaakka polidi naagikko, yaatikko, i xillo asa, i tumu paxa de7ana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: If he beget a son that is a robber, a shedder of blood, and that doeth the like to any one of these things,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha bitaniyaassi shemppo woriyaa, bonqqiya, woikko ha geetettidabatuppe augaa gidinkka oottiya issi iita na7i de7ikko,

English Sentences: And that doeth not any of those duties, but even hath eaten upon the mountains, and defiled his neighbour's wife,
Wolaitta Sentences: ba aawai oottibeennabaa ubbabaa oottees. I deriyaa bolli de7iya eeqau goinniyo sohotun mees; i ba shooruwaa maccaasaa tunissees;

English Sentences: Hath oppressed the poor and needy, hath spoiled by violence, hath not restored the pledge, and hath lifted up his eyes to the idols, hath committed abomination,
Wolaitta Sentences: i hiyyeesaanne manqquwaa huqqunnees; i asabaa bonqqees; acuwaassi oiqqidobaa zaarenna; eeqaukka goinnees; tunabaakka oottees;

English Sentences: Hath given forth upon usury, and hath taken increase: shall he then live? he shall not live: he hath done all these abominations; he shall surely die; his blood shall be upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: i dichchau tal77idi, woriyaa ekkees. Hegaa mala asi paxa de7anee? CHii, i paxa de7enna! I hegaa mala tunabaa oottido gishshau, i tuma haiqqana; a suuttaa acoikka a bollaana gidana.

English Sentences: Now, lo, if he beget a son, that seeth all his father's sins which he hath done, and considereth, and doeth not such like,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha iita bitaniyaa na7ai ba aawai oottiyo ha nagaraa ubbaa be7iiddi, i hegaa malabaa oottana xayikko,

English Sentences: That hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, hath not defiled his neighbour's wife,
Wolaitta Sentences: i deriyaa bolli de7iya eeqau goinniyo sohotun maana xayikko, Israa7eela asaa eeqau goinnana xayikko, i ba shooruwaa maccaasaa tunissana xayikko,

English Sentences: Neither hath oppressed any, hath not withholden the pledge, neither hath spoiled by violence, but hath given his bread to the hungry, and hath covered the naked with a garment,
Wolaitta Sentences: i oonanne huqqunnana xayikko, acuwaassi oiqqidobaa guyye zaarikko, i asabaa bonqqana xayikko, bau de7iyaabaappe namisettidaageeta mizikko, kallottidaageetakka maizzikko,

English Sentences: That hath taken off his hand from the poor, that hath not received usury nor increase, hath executed my judgments, hath walked in my statutes; he shall not die for the iniquity of his father, he shall surely live.
Wolaitta Sentences: i woriyaa ekkanau dichchau tal77ana xayikko, balaappe kushiyaa shiishshi ekkikko, i ta higgiyaa naagikko, ta wogankka hemettikko, yaatikko, i paxa de7anappe attin, ba aawaa nagaran haiqqenna.

English Sentences: As for his father, because he cruelly oppressed, spoiled his brother by violence, and did that which is not good among his people, lo, even he shall die in his iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a aawai ba ishantta wolqqan bonqqido gishshaunne ba asaa giddon iitaa oottido gishshau, ba nagaran haiqqana.

English Sentences: Yet say ye, Why? doth not the son bear the iniquity of the father? When the son hath done that which is lawful and right, and hath kept all my statutes, and hath done them, he shall surely live.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte, Na7ai ba aawaa nagaran aissi qaxxayettennee? yaageeta. Na7ai tumu pirddaanne suuretettaa oottidi, ta higgiyaa minttidi naagikko, i tumu paxa de7ana.

English Sentences: The soul that sinneth, it shall die. The son shall not bear the iniquity of the father, neither shall the father bear the iniquity of the son: the righteousness of the righteous shall be upon him, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaraa oottiya shemppoi i bau haiqqana. Na7ai aawaa nagaran qaxxayettenna; hegaadankka, aawai na7aa nagaran qaxxayettenna. Xillo asa xillotettai he aawussa gidana; iita asa iitatettaikka he aawussa gidana.

English Sentences: But if the wicked will turn from all his sins that he hath committed, and keep all my statutes, and do that which is lawful and right, he shall surely live, he shall not die.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin nagaranchchai ba oottido nagara ubbaappe simmidi, ta azazuwaa naagikkonne tumu pirddaanne suuretettaa oottikko, i tumu paxa de7anaappe attin haiqqenna.

English Sentences: All his transgressions that he hath committed, they shall not be mentioned unto him: in his righteousness that he hath done he shall live.
Wolaitta Sentences: I oottido naaquwaappe issoinne qofettenna. Ba oottido xillo oosuwaa gishshau, i paxa de7ana.

English Sentences: Have I any pleasure at all that the wicked should die? saith the Lord GOD: and not that he should return from his ways, and live?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaranchchai ba ogiyaappe simmidi, paxa de7iyoogan ufaittaisippe attin, taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI a haiquwan ufaittikke.

English Sentences: But when the righteous turneth away from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, and doeth according to all the abominations that the wicked man doeth, shall he live? All his righteousness that he hath done shall not be mentioned: in his trespass that he hath trespassed, and in his sin that he hath sinned, in them shall he die.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin xillo asi ba xillotettaappe guyye simmidi, nagaranchcha asi oottiyo nagaraanne tuna oosuwaa oottikko, i paxa de7anee? CHii, i oottido xillo oosuwaappe issoinne qofettenna; i ammanettennan ixxido gishshaunne i oottido nagaraa ubbaa gishshau, i haiqqana.

English Sentences: Yet ye say, The way of the LORD is not equal. Hear now, O house of Israel; Is not my way equal? are not your ways unequal?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte hegan, Godaa ogee suure gidenna yaageeta. Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, ha77i siyite! Suure gidennai intte ogiyaa gidennee ta ogee?

English Sentences: When a righteous man turneth away from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, and dieth in them; for his iniquity that he hath done shall he die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillo asi ba xillotettaappe guyye simmidi, nagaraa oottiyo wode, i ba oottido nagaraa gishshaa haiqqana.

English Sentences: Again, when the wicked man turneth away from his wickedness that he hath committed, and doeth that which is lawful and right, he shall save his soul alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin iita asi ba iitatettaappe guyye simmidi, tumu pirddaanne suuretettaa oottiyo wode, i ba shemppuwaa ashshana.

English Sentences: Because he considereth, and turneth away from all his transgressions that he hath committed, he shall surely live, he shall not die.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba oottido nagaraa ubbaa qoppidi simmido gishshau, i tumu paxa de7anaappe attin haiqqenna.

English Sentences: Yet saith the house of Israel, The way of the LORD is not equal. O house of Israel, are not my ways equal? are not your ways unequal?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Israa7eela asati, Godaa ogee suure gidenna yaagidosona. Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, suure gidennai intte ogiyaa gidennee ta ogee?

English Sentences: Therefore I will judge you, O house of Israel, every one according to his ways, saith the Lord GOD. Repent, and turn yourselves from all your transgressions; so iniquity shall not be your ruin.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, taani inttena ubbaakka intte ogiyaadan ogiyaadan pirddana. Nagarai intte xayuwaassi gaaso gidennaadan paaxite; intte mooro ubbaappekka simmite. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Cast away from you all your transgressions, whereby ye have transgressed; and make you a new heart and a new spirit: for why will ye die, O house of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte naaqqido naaqo ubbaappe shaahettidi, ooratta wozanaanne ooratta ayyaanaa ekkite. Inttenoo Israa7eela asatoo, aibissi haiqqeetii?

English Sentences: For I have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth, saith the Lord GOD: wherefore turn yourselves, and live ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani issi asa haiquwaaninne ufaittikke. Hegaa gishshau, intte nagaraa paaxi simmidi, paxa de7ite! Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaa odais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover take thou up a lamentation for the princes of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Hizqqeela, "Israa7eela halaqatuyyo hagaadan yaagada zilaala;

English Sentences: And say, What is thy mother? A lioness: she lay down among lions, she nourished her whelps among young lions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte aayyiyaa gaammotu giddon a aiba gaammoo! Yelaga gaammotu giddon gisada, ba marata dichchaasu.

English Sentences: And she brought up one of her whelps: it became a young lion, and it learned to catch the prey; it devoured men.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ba maratuppe issuwaa dichchin, wodala gaammo kiyiis. I shankkaa tamaaridi, asaa miis.

English Sentences: The nations also heard of him; he was taken in their pit, and they brought him with chains unto the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati ubbai abaa siyidi, ollan a gelissidi oiqqidosona. Eti a hinggittan goochchidi, Gibxxe biitti efiidosona.

English Sentences: Now when she saw that she had waited, and her hope was lost, then she took another of her whelps, and made him a young lion.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A aayyiyaa naagoogee polettennan ixxin, hidootai xayidoogaa be7ada, ba maratuppe naa77anttuwaa dichchada, wodala gaammo kessaasu.

English Sentences: And he went up and down among the lions, he became a young lion, and learned to catch the prey, and devoured men.
Wolaitta Sentences: I wodala gaammo gididi, hara gaammotu giddon yaanne haanne simerettiis. I shankkaa tamaaridi, asaa miis.

English Sentences: And he knew their desolate palaces, and he laid waste their cities; and the land was desolate, and the fulness thereof, by the noise of his roaring.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta wolqqaama qatuwaa mentterettidi, katamaakka bashshiis. Biittainne biittan de7iya asai ubbai a gudettan shabbirettiis.

English Sentences: Then the nations set against him on every side from the provinces, and spread their net over him: he was taken in their pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yuushuwan de7iya kawotettati ubbai a oiqqanau piriyaa yeggidosona. Bantta gitiyaakka miccidosona; bantta ollan a oiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And they put him in ward in chains, and brought him to the king of Babylon: they brought him into holds, that his voice should no more be heard upon the mountains of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta hinggittan a goochchidi, koottadan giigida guutta keettan yeggidi, Baabiloone kawuwaakko efiidosona. Naa77antto a gudettai Israa7eela deretun siyettennaadan, eti a qasho keettaa gelissidosona.

English Sentences: Thy mother is like a vine in thy blood, planted by the waters: she was fruitful and full of branches by reason of many waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne aayyiyaa haattaa doonan tokettida woiniyaa turaa mala. Daro haattai de7iyo gishshau, he woiniyaa turai aifiyaa darxxaxxi uttiis; qassi daro maratuura de7ees.

English Sentences: And she had strong rods for the sceptres of them that bare rule, and her stature was exalted among the thick branches, and she appeared in her height with the multitude of her branches.
Wolaitta Sentences: A maratuppe minniyaagee haariyaageetu xam77aa gidiis. A marai gita maratuppe aduqqidi, bollau aadhdhiis. Ba maratu coratettaaninne xoqqatettan bollaara beettiis.

English Sentences: But she was plucked up in fury, she was cast down to the ground, and the east wind dried up her fruit: her strong rods were broken and withered; the fire consumed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he turai hanqquwan shodettidi, biittan olettiis. Arshsho carkkoi a aifiyaa melissiis; a mino marai melin, tamai miis.

English Sentences: And now she is planted in the wilderness, in a dry and thirsty ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i qassi i haatti bainna mela bazzuwan tokettiis.

English Sentences: And fire is gone out of a rod of her branches, which hath devoured her fruit, so that she hath no strong rod to be a sceptre to rule. This is a lamentation, and shall be for a lamentation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamai a maratuppe issuwaa oiqqidi, a aifiyaarakka dippi oottidi miis. Yaatin, kawotaa xam77a gidiya ai mino marikka a bollan attibeenna. "Hagee yeeho zilaassa; hagaa zilaassadan go7ettanau bessees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the seventh year, in the fifth month, the tenth day of the month, that certain of the elders of Israel came to enquire of the LORD, and sat before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni omoodettido laappuntta laittan, ichchashantta aginan, tammantta gallassan, Israa7eela cimatuppe amaridaageeti GODAA oichchanau yiidi, ta sinttan uttidosona.

English Sentences: Then came the word of the LORD unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Son of man, speak unto the elders of Israel, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Are ye come to enquire of me? As I live, saith the Lord GOD, I will not be enquired of by you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laa asa na7au, Israa7eela cimatuyyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte yiidoogee tana oichchanaassee? Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ta de7uwan caaqqais: Taani inttenan oishettikke" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: Wilt thou judge them, son of man, wilt thou judge them? cause them to know the abominations of their fathers:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta bolli pirdduutee? Laa asa na7au, tumu eta bolli pirdduutee? Hegaa gidikko, eta maizza aawatu tuna oosuwaa eta erissa.

English Sentences: And say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; In the day when I chose Israel, and lifted up mine hand unto the seed of the house of Jacob, and made myself known unto them in the land of Egypt, when I lifted up mine hand unto them, saying, I am the LORD your God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau hagaadan yaaga; Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela doorido wode, Yaaqooba zaretussi Gibxxen de7ishin, tanatettaa erissada, Taani GODAA intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: In the day that I lifted up mine hand unto them, to bring them forth of the land of Egypt into a land that I had espied for them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena Gibxxeppe kessada, inttessi doorido biittaa, maattainne eessai goggiyo biittaa, biitta ubbaappe aadhdhida lo77o biittaa ehaana gaada caaqqaas.

English Sentences: Then said I unto them, Cast ye away every man the abominations of his eyes, and defile not yourselves with the idols of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani eta, Intteppe issoi issoi ba siiqiyo tuna eeqata diggo; Gibxxe eeqatun tunoppite. Taani GODAA intte Xoossaa yaagaas.

English Sentences: But they rebelled against me, and would not hearken unto me: they did not every man cast away the abominations of their eyes, neither did they forsake the idols of Egypt: then I said, I will pour out my fury upon them, to accomplish my anger against them in the midst of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin eti taayyo makkalidi, ta odiyoogaa siyennan ixxidosona. Eti bantta amottido tuna eeqata diggibookkona; Gibxxe eeqaukka goinniyoogaa aggibookkona. Hegaa gishshau, eti Gibxxen de7ishin, ta hanqquwaa eta bolli gussanau, ta yiilluwaakka eta bolli wurssanau qoppaas.

English Sentences: But I wrought for my name's sake, that it should not be polluted before the heathen, among whom they were, in whose sight I made myself known unto them, in bringing them forth out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti de7iyo kawotettatu giddooninne Israa7eela asaa Gibxxeppe kessiyoogan, taani tanatettaa erissido asaa sinttan ta sunttai tunennaadan oottaas.

English Sentences: Wherefore I caused them to go forth out of the land of Egypt, and brought them into the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani eta Gibxxeppe kessada, bazzuwau ehaas.

English Sentences: And I gave them my statutes, and shewed them my judgments, which if a man do, he shall even live in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazettiya ubbau de7uwaa immiya ta wogaa taani etau immaas; ta higgiyaakka eta tamaarissaas.

English Sentences: Moreover also I gave them my sabbaths, to be a sign between me and them, that they might know that I am the LORD that sanctify them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta geeshshiyaagee tana GODAA gidiyoogaa eti erana mala, taani ta Sambbataa taappenne etappe gidduwan malaata oottada immaas.

English Sentences: But the house of Israel rebelled against me in the wilderness: they walked not in my statutes, and they despised my judgments, which if a man do, he shall even live in them; and my sabbaths they greatly polluted: then I said, I would pour out my fury upon them in the wilderness, to consume them.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin Israa7eela asai ha bazzuwankka ta bollan makkalidosona. Azazettida ubbau de7uwaa immiya ta wogaadan hemettibookkona; ta higgiyaakka menttidosona; ta Sambbataakka daro tunissidosona. Yaatin, taani bazzon ta hanqquwaa eta bolli gussada, eta wurssanau qoppaas.

English Sentences: But I wrought for my name's sake, that it should not be polluted before the heathen, in whose sight I brought them out.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani eta Gibxxeppe kessiyoogaa be7ida kawotettatu sinttan ta sunttai tunennaadan, eta xaissabeikke.

English Sentences: Yet also I lifted up my hand unto them in the wilderness, that I would not bring them into the land which I had given them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani eti bazzuwan de7ishin, etayyo immido biittaa, maattainne eessai goggiyo biittaa, biitta ubbaappe lo77iya biittaa eta gelissennaadan caaqqaas.

English Sentences: Because they despised my judgments, and walked not in my statutes, but polluted my sabbaths: for their heart went after their idols.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti eeqau goinnidi, ta higgiyaa ixxido gishshaassa, ta wogaadan hemettibeenna gishshaassanne ta Sambbataakka tunissido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Nevertheless mine eye spared them from destroying them, neither did I make an end of them in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, taani etau qarettido gishshau, bazzuwan eta wurssa xaissabeikke.

English Sentences: But I said unto their children in the wilderness, Walk ye not in the statutes of your fathers, neither observe their judgments, nor defile yourselves with their idols:
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Eti bazzuwan de7ishin, taani eta naata hagaadan yaagaas; Intte aawatu wogaadan hemettoppite; eta higgiyaakka naagoppite; woikko eta eeqatun tunoppite.

English Sentences: I am the LORD your God; walk in my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA intte Xoossaa. Ta wogaadan hemettite; ta higgiyaakka naagite.

English Sentences: And hallow my sabbaths; and they shall be a sign between me and you, that ye may know that I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taappenne intteppe gidduwan malaata gidana malanne taani GODAA intte Xoossaa gidiyoogaa intte erana mala, Sambbataa hara gallassaappe dummayite yaagaas.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding the children rebelled against me: they walked not in my statutes, neither kept my judgments to do them, which if a man do, he shall even live in them; they polluted my sabbaths: then I said, I would pour out my fury upon them, to accomplish my anger against them in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin he naatikka ta bollan makkalidosona; azazettiya asa ubbau de7uwaa immiya ta wogaadan hemettibookkona; ta higgiyaakka eti naagibookkona; ta Sambbataakka tunissidosona. Yaatin, taani bazzon ta hanqquwaa eta bolli gussanau, ta yiilluwaakka eta bolli wurssanau qoppaas.

English Sentences: Nevertheless I withdrew mine hand, and wrought for my name's sake, that it should not be polluted in the sight of the heathen, in whose sight I brought them forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ta kushiyaa shiishsha ekkaas. Taani eta Gibxxeppe kessiyoogaa be7ida kawotettatu sinttan ta sunttai tunennaadan, eta xaissabeikke.

English Sentences: I lifted up mine hand unto them also in the wilderness, that I would scatter them among the heathen, and disperse them through the countries;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta hara kawotettatussinne hara biittatussi laalanau bazzon caaqqaas.

English Sentences: Because they had not executed my judgments, but had despised my statutes, and had polluted my sabbaths, and their eyes were after their fathers' idols.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti ta wogau azazettennan ixxidosona; ta higgiyaakka menttidosona; ta Sambbataa tunissidosonanne bantta aawatu eeqaa amottidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore I gave them also statutes that were not good, and judgments whereby they should not live;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qassi etassi lo77o gidenna wogatanne de7uwaa immenna higgeta immaas.

English Sentences: And I polluted them in their own gifts, in that they caused to pass through the fire all that openeth the womb, that I might make them desolate, to the end that they might know that I am the LORD.
